context.text: List of Governors of North Carolina - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Name Took office Left office Party Notes
List of Governors of North Carolina

Presidents of the Council: Cornelius Harnett (18 Oct. 1775 - 5 March 1776; 5 June 1776 - 21 August 1776) Samuel Ashe (21 August 1776 - 27 September 1776) Willie Jones (27 September 1776 - 25 Oct. 1776; some sources indicate that Jones was president through Nov. 12, when the Fifth Provincial Congress convened.)

The 13-member Provincial Council, renamed the Council of Safety in April 1776, was essentially the executive authority during the second year of the Revolution, and was appointed by the Provincial Congress . The Presidency of the Council and the Presidency of the Congress could each be considered the highest offices in the state during this time, but the council was supreme when the congress was not in session.
[ edit ] Colonial governors Further information: List of colonial governors of North Carolina
The following is a list of governors or chief executives for the U.S. state of North Carolina . See also History of North Carolina .
List of Governors of North Carolina
